mapper.sql: id, shelves_id, shelves_line, shelves_column, shelves_type, length, width, height, maximum_weight, category_upper_limit, is_good, status, create_user, create_time, remarks
mapper.select: select a.id,a.createTime,a.shelvesId from (select id,create_time createTime,shelves_id shelvesId from warehouse_area_shelves_location wasl where status = 1 group by shelvesId) a where not exists (select 1 from (select id,create_time createTime,shelves_id shelvesId from warehouse_area_shelves_location wasl where status = 1 group by shelvesId) b where b.shelvesId = a.shelvesId and b.createTime >= a.createTime )

select wasl.id, wasl.shelves_id shelvesId, wasl.shelves_line shelvesLine, wasl.shelves_column shelvesColumn, wasl.shelves_type shelvesType, wasl.length, wasl.width, wasl.height, wasl.maximum_weight maximumWeight, wasl.category_upper_limit categoryUpperLimit, w.name,w.code,wa.area_name areaName,wa.area_code areaCode,was.shelves_name shelvesName from warehouse_area_shelves_location wasl left join warehouse_area_shelves was on wasl.shelves_id = was.id left join warehouse_area wa on wa.`id` = was.`area_id` left join warehouse w on w.`id` = wa.`warehouse_id` where wasl.status = 1 and wasl.shelves_id = #{form.shelvesId} order by wasl.create_time desc
